name: Pixel Drawing
description:
Pixel Drawing is simple puzzle where you need to draw the pixels of the picture in the right places to repeat the original image. Pixel-by-pixel draw pictures and pump your mind!

- 20 levels
- all sorts of options on each of them
- pleasant music
- addictive gameplay
- thematic achievements

As soon as possible:
- themed trading cards
- themed backgrounds
- themed emoticons
